text: aur (yaad karo) jab ibraaheem ne apane paalanahaar se praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! is chhetr ko shaanti ka nagar bana de tatha isake vaasiyon ko, jo unamen se allaah aur antim din (pralay) par eemaan rakhe, vibhinn prakaar kee upaj (phalon) se aajeevika pradaan kar. (allaah ne) kahaah tatha jo kaafir hai, use bhee main thoda laabh doonga, phir use narak kee yaatana kee or baadhy kar doonga aur vah bahut bura sthaan hai
